argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lt.1 | |- A e. RR |
| 2 |  | lt.2 | |- B e. RR |
| 3 |  | lt.3 | |- C e. RR |
| 4 |  | #P_axltadd | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A < B -> ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mp3an | |- ( A < B -> ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_axltadd | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ A e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( B < A -> ( C + B ) < ( C + A ) ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 1, 3, 6 | #P_mp3an | |- ( B < A -> ( C + B ) < ( C + A ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( B = A -> ( C + B ) = ( C + A ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_orim12i | |- ( ( B < A \/ B = A ) -> ( ( C + B ) < ( C + A ) \/ ( C + B ) = ( C + A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 1 | #P_leloei | |- ( B <_ A <-> ( B < A \/ B = A ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 2 | #P_readdcli | |- ( C + B ) e. RR |
| 12 | 3, 1 | #P_readdcli | |- ( C + A ) e. RR |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_leloei | |- ( ( C + B ) <_ ( C + A ) <-> ( ( C + B ) < ( C + A ) \/ ( C + B ) = ( C + A ) ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 10, 13 | #P_3imtr4i | |- ( B <_ A -> ( C + B ) <_ ( C + A ) ) |
| 15 | 2, 1 | #P_lenlti | |- ( B <_ A <-> -. A < B ) |
| 16 | 11, 12 | #P_lenlti | |- ( ( C + B ) <_ ( C + A ) <-> -. ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 15, 16 | #P_3imtr3i | |- ( -. A < B -> -. ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_con4i | |- ( ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) -> A < B ) |
| 19 | 5, 18 | #P_impbii | |- ( A < B <-> ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) ) |
\
 Addition to both sides of 'less than'.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-1997.)  (Proof shortened by Paul Chapman, 27-Jan-2008.) Obsolete version of ~ ltadd2i as of 25-Mar-2020. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
